dcterms:description: The Habitat-Matterport 3D dataset (HM3D) consists of scenes which are 3D reconstructions of real-world environments with semantic annotations. These scenes are split into three distinct subsets for training, validation, and testing.
dcterms:title: Habitat-Matterport 3D dataset (HM3D)
